meanings.definition: Taking place or located in the open air; outdoor.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed an alfresco picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: We decided to have our picnic alfresco, under the shade of a tree.
meanings.sent3: The alfresco party was a hit, with everyone enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The alfresco wedding ceremony was a beautiful celebration of love under the sky.
meanings.sent5: The alfresco dining experience made the food taste even better in the open air.

meanings.definition: A meal or event held outdoors.
meanings.sent1: Let's have our family reunion as an alfresco this year.
meanings.sent2: The company organized an alfresco lunch for the employees in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The alfresco dinner turned into a memorable evening under the stars.
meanings.sent4: The alfresco barbecue was a sizzling success with friends and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The alfresco event was a breath of fresh air compared to indoor gatherings.
